reviewtext: I love to shoot this film indoors with my SMC Pentax-M 50mm f/1.4 lens on one of my Pentax bodies for available-light shots. The colors are good and the grain is minimal. My go-to film is Fujicolor 200 because it can be had so inexpensively, but when I need a couple extra stops I reach for this Superia X-tra 800 every time.
